GD_Allium_Delivery.M_Delivery.name: Special Delivery
GD_Allium_Delivery.M_Delivery.description: Smaller-than-average Tim has received a stock of presents from the Hyperion corporation. Unfortunately, he can't deliver the presents himself and needs you to make the rounds in his stead.

GD_Allium_GrandmaFlexington.M_ListenToGr.name: Grandma Flexington's Story
GD_Allium_GrandmaFlexington.M_ListenToGr.description: Mister Torgue's grandmother is a big fan of yours. He's asked you to go talk to her and listen to whatever stories she might want to tell you.

GD_Allium_KillSnowman.M_KillSnowman.name: Get Frosty
GD_Allium_KillSnowman.M_KillSnowman.description: Marcus needs you to investigate [place]Gingerton[-place], a snowy mountain town that is expecting a shipment from him.

GD_Allium_Side_GrandmaRaid.M_ListenToGra.name: Grandma Flexington's Story: Raid Difficulty
GD_Allium_Side_GrandmaRaid.M_ListenToGra.description: Grandma Flexington has another story for you. Bring your friends.

GD_Allium_TG_Plot_Mission01.M_Allium_Tha.name: The Hunger Pangs
GD_Allium_TG_Plot_Mission01.M_Allium_Tha.description: Mister Torgue has invited you to the Torgue corporation's ''Hunger For Violence Extravaganza'', where Pandora's badasses can test their mettle against the Ravenous Wattle Gobbler. Just find Torgue, and he'll explain how you're meant to survive this epic battle of meat and explosions.

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission020.M_Anemone_Plo.name: Spore Chores
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission020.M_Anemone_Plo.description: Lilith and Ellie joined you at [place]The Backburner[-place]. After Lilith found out the hard way that Sanctuary was flooded with poisonous gas, she turned to Tannis for help. Tannis said she first needs to learn more about the mutation, and has requested infected flower samples.

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission025.M_Anemone_Plo.name: Winging It
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission025.M_Anemone_Plo.description: Mordecai and his companion Talon may have found a way back to Sanctuary. From his position on Mount Scarab, he's spotted a wave of New Pandora soldiers approaching the Backburner. To defend against them, Lilith has asked you to help Ellie repair the camp's turrets.

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission030.M_Anemone_Plo.name: A Hard Place
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission030.M_Anemone_Plo.description: The secret entrance to Cassius' lab is behind an impenetrable door. Mordecai suggested using the moonshot cannon from the crashed Helios station to blast through the door. To get to Helios, you'll need to travel through a secret bandit tunnel network known as [place]The Burrows[-place].

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission040.M_Anemone_Plo.name: Shooting The Moon
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission040.M_Anemone_Plo.description: Helios is still overrun with enemy Loader bots. You'll need to fight your way through the wreckage and find the moonshot control room in order to blast down the doors to Cassius' lab.

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission050.M_Anemone_Plo.name: The Cost of Progress
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission050.M_Anemone_Plo.description: In an attempt to stop Cassius, Hector released the gas directly into the facility. Luckily, Cassius was able to contain the gas and keep you from being turned into a plant monster. However, you still need to vent the gas and be decontaminated before you can safely enter Cassius' lab.

GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission060.M_Anemone_Plo.name: Paradise Found
GD_Anemone_Plot_Mission060.M_Anemone_Plo.description: You successfully developed an antidote and saved Mordecai. Now, you just need to save the rest of the planet. Hector is still on Sanctuary preparing to release the weaponized gas across the whole planet. Get to Sanctuary, and stop him.

GD_Anemone_Side_Claptocurrency.M_Claptoc.name: Claptocurrency
GD_Anemone_Side_Claptocurrency.M_Claptoc.description: Claptrap has a brilliant get-rich-quick-and-unethically scheme! He didn't give many details, but the job seems easy enough: first, deliver a chain of blocks to the Dahl mines.

GD_Anemone_Side_Echoes.M_Anemone_EchoesO.name: Echoes of the Past
GD_Anemone_Side_Echoes.M_Anemone_EchoesO.description: You came across some of Colonel Hector's ECHO logs detailing his arrival to Pandora. Unfortunately, it seems like he scattered them all around. What a jerk.

GD_Anemone_Side_EyeSnipers.M_Anemone_Eye.name: BFFFs
GD_Anemone_Side_EyeSnipers.M_Anemone_Eye.description: Brick's asked you to help him with a present for Mordecai, which is one of the sweetest missions you've ever taken on. Awww. He needs you to kill a bunch of guys and loot their gun components. Awwwww.

GD_Anemone_Side_HypoOathPart1.M_Hypocrit.name: Hypocritical Oath
GD_Anemone_Side_HypoOathPart1.M_Hypocrit.description: Dr. Zed is confident he can cure the people infected by Hector. And if he happens to impress Tannis along the way, well, that's just a bonus. All he needs to put the plan in motion is for you to kill the infected and bring their viscera to him to study.

GD_Anemone_Side_HypoOathPart2.M_Hypocrit.name: Cadeuceus
GD_Anemone_Side_HypoOathPart2.M_Hypocrit.description: Dr. Zed is at it again, hiring Vault Hunters to kill mutants for science, and love! He wants you to bring him some body bits from stronger mutants this time.

GD_Anemone_Side_MyBrittlePony.M_Anemone_.name: My Brittle Pony
GD_Anemone_Side_MyBrittlePony.M_Anemone_.description: Somewhere in the remains of Helios, Butt Stallion is all alone. Vaughn's asked you to find her and make sure she's okay. Don't worry, though. You'll have assistance from the cream of the mercenary crop.

GD_Anemone_Side_OddestCouple.M_Anemone_O.name: The Oddest Couple
GD_Anemone_Side_OddestCouple.M_Anemone_O.description: Marcus has locked himself in a bunker with Crazy Earl, because for some reason he thinks it's safe. Unfortunately, he's out of food. He's asked you to bring him some food in exchange for a reward.

GD_Anemone_Side_RaidBoss.M_Anemone_Cacop.name: A Most Cacophonous Lure
GD_Anemone_Side_RaidBoss.M_Anemone_Cacop.description: Sir Hammerlock has discovered a new and terrifying Pandoran monster that will almost certainly require four Vault Hunters cooperating to take it down, and one of those Vault Hunters is you! If you're up to the challenge, head to the creature's lair.

GD_Anemone_Side_Sirentology.M_Anemone_Si.name: Sirentology
GD_Anemone_Side_Sirentology.M_Anemone_Si.description: Lilith discovered an old prototype of Angel's Control Core Chamber in [place]Helios Fallen[-place]. Obviously, there's only one thing to do: destroy it. Head to the secret chamber in Helios.

GD_Anemone_Side_SpaceCowboy.M_Anemone_Sp.name: Space Cowboy
GD_Anemone_Side_SpaceCowboy.M_Anemone_Sp.description: Moxxi found an ECHO among Scooter's things. Apparently, it's for you.

GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart1.M_Anemone_Va.name: The Vaughnguard
GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart1.M_Anemone_Va.description: Vaughn's latest bandit clan was wiped out, and he needs your help to muster up a new clan! He's given you some flags to fly over the territories of rival bandit leaders -- you know, once you kill them for him.

GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart2.M_Anemone_Va.name: The Hunt is Vaughn
GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart2.M_Anemone_Va.description: Despite the rocky start of his new clan, Vaughn has a new batch of bandit recruits to put through their paces. To prove their strength and cunning, he's asked all his recruits -- including you -- to retrieve trophies from a den of ravenous sandworms.

GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart3.M_Anemone_Va.name: Chief Executive Overlord
GD_Anemone_Side_VaughnPart3.M_Anemone_Va.description: Being a bandit-king means occasionally seeking wise counsel from trusted advisors. But, in a pinch, random new acquaintances are the next best thing. Vaughn's asked you to ask around and see if anyone has some sage advice on how to get good at being bad.

GD_Aster_AmuletDoNothing.M_AmuletDoNothi.name: The Amulet
GD_Aster_AmuletDoNothing.M_AmuletDoNothi.description: A mysterious merchant named Mister Miz has offered you an amulet. He won't say what it does, but he mentioned that if he were to only use one piece of gear to survive the Sorcerer's armies, he would choose the amulet. You may either buy the amulet, or punch Miz in the face.

GD_Aster_ClaptrapApprentice.M_ClaptrapAp.name: The Claptrap's Apprentice
GD_Aster_ClaptrapApprentice.M_ClaptrapAp.description: With his magical beard and wand at the ready, Claptrap has decided to finally test out his prowess as a sorcerer. He needs you to stand around and look impressed while he makes fireworks shoot out of his fingers or something.

GD_Aster_ClapTrapBeard.M_ClapTrapBeard.name: The Beard Makes The Man
GD_Aster_ClapTrapBeard.M_ClapTrapBeard.description:
Claptrap needs a beard to increase his magic power. As he is a robot, however, he's incapable of growing one.

He's asked you to kill some dwarves in [place]Mines of Avarice[-place] by luring them into the mining equipment. If you can collect some of the bloody facial hair that results from the carnage, you can forge it into a brand-new beard!

GD_Aster_ClaptrapWand.M_WandMakesTheMan.name: My Kingdom for a Wand
GD_Aster_ClaptrapWand.M_WandMakesTheMan.description: Even with his sweet beard, Claptrap still doesn't feel like a proper sorcerer. He needs you to take his wand, jam it into some creatures, and then kill them in specific ways. In death, the creatures will charge the wand and Claptrap will be one step closer to becoming a real sorcerer.

GD_Aster_CriticalFail.M_CriticalFail.name: Critical Fail
GD_Aster_CriticalFail.M_CriticalFail.description: As thanks for chasing the douchebags out of her tavern, Moxxi has given you one of her guns. You just need to go pick it up.

GD_Aster_DeadBrother.M_MyDeadBrother.name: My Dead Brother
GD_Aster_DeadBrother.M_MyDeadBrother.description: A fast-talking wizard named Simon just cursed you. Thanks to Simon, you now have the ability to revive the dead (a benefit he gladly mentioned to you), and will die in a week if the curse isn't removed (which he didn't mention). Simon has agreed to remove the curse if you can find and revive Simon's dead brother, Edgar.

GD_Aster_DemonicSouls.M_DemonicSouls.name: Lost Souls
GD_Aster_DemonicSouls.M_DemonicSouls.description: You've met a skeleton who appears to need your help. He has asked you, somewhat cryptically, to return his souls to him.

GD_Aster_EllieDress.M_EllieDress.name: Ell in Shining Armor
GD_Aster_EllieDress.M_EllieDress.description: Ellie the swordswoman is in charge of protecting the town of [place]Flamerock Refuge[-place]. Unfortunately, she lacks one of the most basic swordswoman's necessities: a set of armor. She's asked you to head to [place]The Dark Forest[-place] and grab something that will protect her.

GD_Aster_FakeGeekGuy.M_FakeGeekGuy.name: Fake Geek Guy
GD_Aster_FakeGeekGuy.M_FakeGeekGuy.description: Lilith is afraid that Mister Torgue -- with his huge muscles and rugged good looks -- is actually faking interest in Bunkers & Badasses just to look trendy. Tina has come up with a way to find out Torgue's true nerdiness for sure: she's scattered several geeky questions across her campaign. If you can find them, the group will determine whether Torgue is faking his geekiness or not.

GD_Aster_FeedButtStallion.M_FeedButtStal.name: Feed Butt Stallion
GD_Aster_FeedButtStallion.M_FeedButtStal.description: Queen Butt Stallion is hungry. Tina thinks you should feed her.

GD_Aster_LootNinja.M_LootNinja.name: Loot Ninja
GD_Aster_LootNinja.M_LootNinja.description: A knight named Sir Gallow suspects one of his friends of a most heinous crime: loot ninja-ing. In other words, someone has stolen all of the gear that dropped from an enemy he and his buddies killed. He's asked you to track down his friends and kill them all in an attempt to discover which of them stole his loot.

GD_Aster_MMORPGFPS.M_MMORPGFPS.name: MMORPGFPS
GD_Aster_MMORPGFPS.M_MMORPGFPS.description: Mister Torgue has informed you of a big-ass monster outside the village of [place]Flamerock Refuge[-place]. He's asked you to head out there and get credit for killing it.

GD_Aster_PetButtStallion.M_PettButtStall.name: Pet Butt Stallion
GD_Aster_PetButtStallion.M_PettButtStall.description: Butt Stallion would like to be petted. You should pet her.

GD_Aster_Plot_Mission01.M_Aster_PlotMiss.name: A Role-Playing Game
GD_Aster_Plot_Mission01.M_Aster_PlotMiss.description:
Lacking anything else to do, Tina, Lilith, Mordecai and Brick have decided to play a round of Pandora's most famous role-playing game, ''Bunkers & Badasses''. Basically, this means that you're currently inside Tiny Tina's imagination. God help you.

Your adventure begins outside the town of [place]Flamerock Refuge[-place]. Tina, your Bunker Master, has asked you to head to the town.

GD_Aster_Plot_Mission02.M_Aster_PlotMiss.name: Denial, Anger, Initiative
GD_Aster_Plot_Mission02.M_Aster_PlotMiss.description: The queen of [place]Flamerock Refuge[-place] disappeared somewhere in [place]The Forest of Tranquility[-place]. Eleanor the swordswoman has asked you to head into the forest and track the queen down.

GD_Aster_Plot_Mission03.M_Aster_PlotMiss.name: Dwarven Allies
GD_Aster_Plot_Mission03.M_Aster_PlotMiss.description: Upon learning that the Handsome Sorcerer kidnapped Flamerock's queen, Roland the White Knight suggested you fight your way through the [place]Mines of Avarice[-place], which hold a shortcut to the Handsome Sorcerer's tower and, hopefully, the queen.

GD_Aster_Plot_Mission04.M_Aster_PlotMiss.name: A Game of Games
GD_Aster_Plot_Mission04.M_Aster_PlotMiss.description: With the entrance to the mines open, nothing stands between you and the Sorcerer's tower, where the kidnapped queen awaits her rescue.

GD_Aster_Post-Crumpocalyptic.M_Post-Crum.name: Post-Crumpocalyptic
GD_Aster_Post-Crumpocalyptic.M_Post-Crum.description: Ever since the Handsome Sorcerer cast his nefarious Crumpocalypse spell, the village of [place]Flamerock Refuge[-place] has desperately needed all the food they can get. Mad Moxxi has asked you to keep an eye out for any crumpets you might find in your travels.

GD_Aster_RaidBoss.M_Aster_RaidBoss.name: Raiders of the Last Boss
GD_Aster_RaidBoss.M_Aster_RaidBoss.description: Mister Torgue knows of a raid boss somewhere out in the wilds of this fantastic land. If you have the courage and three friends (or a really sick-ass build), you may just have the strength to kill the raid boss and reap the rewards!

GD_Aster_RollInsight.M_RollInsight.name: Roll Insight
GD_Aster_RollInsight.M_RollInsight.description: Sir Reginald Von Bartlesby, local aristocrat and purveyor of the fine arts, has a riddle for you. If you can answer correctly, you may have a reward coming.

GD_Aster_SwordInStone.M_SwordInStoner.name: The Sword in The Stoner
GD_Aster_SwordInStone.M_SwordInStoner.description: An unmotivated golem in [place]The Docks[-place] has stolen Roland's sword. If you can yoink the sword out of the creature's back and return it to Roland, he'll likely reward you.

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Round 1
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description: Welcome to the Magic Slaughter! Your host, Murderlin The Wizard, has asked you to prepare yourself for five rounds of magic, traps, and intense brutality. If you can survive all five rounds, you shall be remembered forever!

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Round 2
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description:
Welcome to the Magic Slaughter! Your host, Murderlin The Wizard, has asked you to prepare yourself for five rounds of magic, traps, and intense brutality. If you can survive all five rounds, you shall be remembered forever!
You may have completed the first round, but the second will unleash all kinds of new horrors upon you. Better be prepared.

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Round 3
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description:
Welcome to the Magic Slaughter! Your host, Murderlin The Wizard, has asked you to prepare yourself for five rounds of magic, traps, and intense brutality. If you can survive all five rounds, you shall be remembered forever!
You have successfully made it to the third round. Good luck!

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Round 4
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description:
Welcome to the Magic Slaughter! Your host, Murderlin The Wizard, has asked you to prepare yourself for five rounds of magic, traps, and intense brutality. If you can survive all five rounds, you shall be remembered forever!
You have successfully made it to the second-to-last round. Good luck!

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Round 5
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description:
Welcome to the Magic Slaughter! Your host, Murderlin The Wizard, has asked you to prepare yourself for five rounds of magic, traps, and intense brutality. If you can survive all five rounds, you shall be remembered forever!
You have successfully made it to the final and most difficult round. Good luck!

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Magic Slaughter: Badass Round
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description: Welcome to the repeatable badass round! As a reward for triumphing over the Magic Slaughter's five rounds of breakneck combat, you may replay this badass-filled combat as many times as you so wish. Luck be with you!

GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.name: Find Murderlin's Temple
GD_Aster_TempleSlaughter.M_TempleSlaught.description: Moxxi -- who, as you may remember, owns several Circles of Slaughter throughout Pandora -- has set up a magic-themed arena somewhere in Tina's fantasy world. If you can find Murderlin the Wizard, he will help you fight your way through a few rounds of fantastical violence.

GD_Aster_TempleTower.M_TempleTower.name: The Magic of Childhood
GD_Aster_TempleTower.M_TempleTower.description: Murderlin The Wizard has asked you to babysit his son, Murderlin Jr., for a little while.

GD_Aster_TreeHugger.M_TreeHugger.name: Tree Hugger
GD_Aster_TreeHugger.M_TreeHugger.description: A treant named Aubrey has asked you for help. A gang of orcs have set up a lumber camp within [place]The Forest of Being Eaten Alive By Trees[-place]. If you can plant and protect a treant sapling until it grows to maturity and destroys the camp, you'll have Aubrey's (sarcastic, halfhearted) thanks.

GD_Aster_WinterIsComing.M_WinterIsComing.name: Winter is a Bloody Business
GD_Aster_WinterIsComing.M_WinterIsComing.description: Roland wants you to take care of an evil prince named Jeffrey. In this context, however, ''take care of'' doesn't actually mean ''kill'' -- Roland just wants you to find Jeffrey, kill his guards, and slap him around until he stops acting like such a jerk.

GD_Episode01.M_Ep1_Champion.name: My First Gun
GD_Episode01.M_Ep1_Champion.description: After Handsome Jack left you for dead in [place]Windshear Waste[-place], you escaped the cold and met a CL4P-TP steward bot -- the last of his kind on Pandora. He has invited you into his igloo.

GD_Episode02.M_Ep2_Henchman.name: Blindsided
GD_Episode02.M_Ep2_Henchman.description:
After Handsome Jack left you for dead in [place]Windshear Waste[-place], you escaped the cold and met a CL4P-TP steward bot -- the last of his kind on Pandora. He has enlisted you as his minion; you are to help him kill Jack and save Pandora.

Before you can do any of that, however, you will need to deal with a slightly more pressing matter: Claptrap's eye has been ripped out by a bullymong, and you must help him retrieve it.

GD_Episode02.M_Ep2a_MoreGuns.name: Cleaning up the Berg
GD_Episode02.M_Ep2a_MoreGuns.description: You've found Claptrap's eye, but he still needs someone to plug it into his socket. That someone happens to be one Sir Hammerlock, who currently resides in the town of [place]Liar's Berg[-place]. Claptrap wants you to head there now.

GD_Episode02.M_Ep2b_Henchman.name: Shielded Favors
GD_Episode02.M_Ep2b_Henchman.description: Sir Hammerlock has suggested that, if you're expecting to leave [place]Southern Shelf[-place] alive, you'll need a better shield. He wants you to head to an abandoned shop and former Crimson Raider base. Once there, you can purchase a better shield.

GD_Episode02.M_Ep2c_Henchman.name: Best Minion Ever
GD_Episode02.M_Ep2c_Henchman.description: Now that his minion (that's you!) is well-armed and raring for a fight, Claptrap feels it is time for you and him to head to [place]Sanctuary[-place] -- the last free town on Pandora. In order to reach [place]Sanctuary[-place], you'll need to steal Claptrap's boat back from the nefarious Captain Flynt. One obstacle stands between you and Flynt, however: Flynt's henchman, an explosives expert named Boom Bewm.

GD_Episode03.M_Ep3_CatchARide.name: The Road to Sanctuary
GD_Episode03.M_Ep3_CatchARide.description: [place]Sanctuary[-place]. The last free city on Pandora. Within its walls, you will find Roland, the leader of the resistance against Handsome Jack. You'll also find safety, comfort, and at least a few people whose primary mode of communication isn't delivered through the barrel of a gun.

GD_Episode04.M_Ep4_WelcomeToSanctuary.name: Plan B
GD_Episode04.M_Ep4_WelcomeToSanctuary.description: You've made it to [place]Sanctuary[-place]. This would be awesome, were it not for the fact that the man you came here to find -- Roland, the leader of the Crimson Raiders -- went missing shortly before your arrival.

GD_Episode05.M_Ep5_ThePhoenix.name: Hunting the Firehawk
GD_Episode05.M_Ep5_ThePhoenix.description: In order to defeat Jack, you will need to find a soldier named Roland. If you search Roland's safe, maybe you can find out where he's disappeared to.

GD_Episode06.M_Ep6_RescueRoland.name: A Dam Fine Rescue
GD_Episode06.M_Ep6_RescueRoland.description: Roland, the de facto leader of the resistance against Hyperion and Handsome Jack, has been kidnapped by the Bloodshot bandit clan. This is a bad thing. Lilith has instructed you to infiltrate [place]Bloodshot Stronghold[-place] and break Roland out. Simple!

GD_Episode07.M_Ep7_ATrainToCatch.name: A Train to Catch
GD_Episode07.M_Ep7_ATrainToCatch.description: You've rescued Roland from Hyperion -- now it's time for the customary ''thanks for rescuing me from those bad guys; now, let's talk about how we're going to put a bullet in Jack's face'' conversation back in [place]Sanctuary[-place].

GD_Episode08.M_Ep8_SanctuaryTakesOff.name: Rising Action
GD_Episode08.M_Ep8_SanctuaryTakesOff.description: You grabbed an experimental power core from [place]Tundra Express[-place]. Given that such a core could keep [place]Sanctuary's[-place] defense shield powered indefinitely, Roland requested you bring it back to Lt. Davis. Give him a hand installing it, will you?

GD_Episode09.M_Ep9_GetBackToSanctuary.name: Bright Lights, Flying City
GD_Episode09.M_Ep9_GetBackToSanctuary.description: [place]Sanctuary[-place] has disappeared. The Guardian Angel has asked you to head through [place]The Fridge[-place]. If you can survive its horrors, the Angel says, you will be able to link up with [place]Sanctuary[-place] on the other side.

GD_Episode10.M_Ep10_BirdISTheWord.name: Wildlife Preservation
GD_Episode10.M_Ep10_BirdISTheWord.description: You made it back to [place]Sanctuary[-place], but the Crimson Raiders still need a plan to take down Handsome Jack. Better talk to Roland and find out your next step.

GD_Episode11.M_Ep11_LikeATonOf.name: The Once and Future Slab
GD_Episode11.M_Ep11_LikeATonOf.description: With the first obstacle to [place]Control Core Angel[-place] accounted for, Roland has turned your attention to the second obstacle: a big-ass Hyperion defense bunker. Roland feels you will need the help of a local bandit leader, the Slab King, to destroy this bunker. The Slab King can be found in [place]Thousand Cuts[-place], but be careful -- though he hates Jack as much as anyone, his men won't exactly welcome you with open arms.

GD_Episode12.M_Ep12_BecomingJack.name: The Man Who Would Be Jack
GD_Episode12.M_Ep12_BecomingJack.description: To stop Jack from awakening the Warrior, you will need to shut down the Guardian Angel. [place]Control Core Angel[-place] is defended by three major obstacles -- two of which you have already planned for. The final obstacle to Angel's lair is a door that will only open for Handsome Jack. Roland's got no idea how to get past this door, unfortunately.

GD_Episode13.M_Ep13_KillAngel.name: Where Angels Fear to Tread
GD_Episode13.M_Ep13_KillAngel.description: Angel is going to give you Handsome Jack, but only if you deactivate her first.

GD_Episode15.M_Ep15_CharacterAssassinati.name: Data Mining
GD_Episode15.M_Ep15_CharacterAssassinati.description: Mordecai has determined that if you can find where the Warrior is buried, you will find Jack. Now that you've helped the Slabs grab some explosives from [place]Sawtooth Cauldron[-place], you're ready to blast your way into the [place]Hyperion Info Stockade[-place] and get the info you need.

GD_Episode16.M_Ep16_LockAndLoad.name: Toil and Trouble
GD_Episode16.M_Ep16_LockAndLoad.description: Mordecai has determined that if you can find where the Warrior is buried, you will find Jack. The [place]Hyperion Info Stockade[-place] has the info you need.

GD_Episode17.M_Ep17_KillJack.name: The Talon of God
GD_Episode17.M_Ep17_KillJack.description: You must find and kill Handsome Jack before he can awaken the Warrior -- partially to save Pandora, partially to save Lilith, and partially because Jack is a real bastard. Jack is holed up in [place]Hero's Pass[-place], where the Warrior is buried. You will need Claptrap to get you through the Hyperion defenses set up there.

GD_FlaxMissions.M_BloodHarvest.name: The Bloody Harvest
GD_FlaxMissions.M_BloodHarvest.description: You have been asked to go meet up with a blind, slightly undead settler named TK Baha who lives out in [place]Hallowed Hollow.[-place] Allegedly, mister Baha may have a job for you.

GD_FlaxMissions.M_TrickOrTreat.name: Trick or Treat
GD_FlaxMissions.M_TrickOrTreat.description: Is it possible to have a sweet tooth when all your teeth have rotted out?

GD_IrisDL2_DontTalkAbtMama.M_IrisDL2_Don.name: Mother-Lover
GD_IrisDL2_DontTalkAbtMama.M_IrisDL2_Don.description: A biker named Hamhock attempted to cop a feel on Scooter's mom, Moxxi. Scooter has ordered you to find Hamhock and take him out.

GD_IrisDL2_ProductRecall.M_IrisDL2_Produ.name: Totally Recall
GD_IrisDL2_ProductRecall.M_IrisDL2_Produ.description: Mister Torgue has informed you that much of the beer in [place]Pyro Pete's Bar[-place] has been poisoned. He needs you to kill some bandits and take their beer so they won't die of poison. As you will be killing the bandits anyway, this plan makes approximately zero sense.

GD_IrisDL2_PumpkinHead.M_IrisDL2_Pumpkin.name: Number One Fan
GD_IrisDL2_PumpkinHead.M_IrisDL2_Pumpkin.description: Tiny Tina has asked you to get an autograph from Sully the Stabber, a murderous gladiator hanging out in [place]The Beatdown.[-place]

GD_IrisDL3_CommAppeal.M_IrisDL3_CommAppe.name: Commercial Appeal
GD_IrisDL3_CommAppeal.M_IrisDL3_CommAppe.description: Mister Torgue wants you to star in the Torgue corporation's newest commercial. He's asked you to use Torgue weaponry to blast your way through [place]Torgue Forge[-place].

GD_IrisDL3_MySkag.M_IrisDL3_MySkag.name: My Husband the Skag
GD_IrisDL3_MySkag.M_IrisDL3_MySkag.description: A man named Jerek has hired you to find his husband, whom he believes has turned into a skag. The husband-skag should be in [place]Torgue Forge[-place] and can be identified by the red scarf around his neck.

GD_IrisDL3_PSYouSuck.M_IrisDL3_PSYouSuck.name: Say That To My Face
GD_IrisDL3_PSYouSuck.M_IrisDL3_PSYouSuck.description: Some bikers left some smack talk for you on the bounty board. As smack talk is nothing without the will to back it up, Mister Torgue suggested you find the smack talkers in [place]Torgue Forge[-place] and take them out.

GD_IrisEpisode01.M_IrisEp1_HighwayToHell.name: Highway To Hell
GD_IrisEpisode01.M_IrisEp1_HighwayToHell.description:
Mister Torgue invited you to the [place]Badass Crater of Badassitude[-place], and you came. You're here to fight the biggest badasses on Pandora for a shot at opening a Vault full of loot (and we promise, it's ACTUALLY full of loot this time).

Before you can get started, however, you'll need to sign the Torgue corporation's legal waiver.

GD_IrisEpisode01.M_IrisEp1_WTTJ.name: Welcome To The Jungle
GD_IrisEpisode01.M_IrisEp1_WTTJ.description: Welcome to the [place]Torgue Arena[-place]! You've got a sponsor -- a hulking bag of muscles and anger named Piston -- and now it's time to enroll in your first event. Piston has asked you to head to the nearby battle board and sign up.

GD_IrisEpisode02.M_IrisEp2_CultOfPersona.name: Battle: Appetite for Destruction
GD_IrisEpisode02.M_IrisEp2_CultOfPersona.description:
You're officially enrolled in the Torgue Badass Tournament -- congratulations. If you want to rise up in the leaderboard, you'll have to compete in a number of different events, all while taking out other higher-ranked gladiators.

Your first event is the Appetite for Destruction, wherein you have to defeat a gang of loosely organized ne'er-do-wells named the Horde of Horrors.

Kill 'em all.

GD_IrisEpisode02.M_IrisEp2_FindBattle.name: Burn, Baby, Burn
GD_IrisEpisode02.M_IrisEp2_FindBattle.description:
You've survived the Appetite for Destruction and are now the 5th biggest badass in the tournament! Your sponsor, Piston, rewarded your hard work with a weapon chest.

An empty weapon chest.

Something in the air smells funny, and not just metaphorically. You're being betrayed, but what else is new. Survive whatever is thrown at you for you to get payback later.

GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.name: Tier 2 Battle: Appetite for Destruction
GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.description:
Compete in Appetite for Destruction, wherein you have to defeat a gang of loosely organized ne'er-do-wells named the Horde of Horrors.

Tier 2 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.name: Tier 3 Battle: Appetite for Destruction
GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.description:
Compete in Appetite for Destruction, wherein you have to defeat a gang of loosely organized ne'er-do-wells named the Horde of Horrors.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.name: Tier 3 Rematch: Appetite for Destruction
GD_IrisEpisode02_Battle.M_IrisEp2Battle_.description:
Compete in Appetite for Destruction, wherein you have to defeat a gang of loosely organized ne'er-do-wells named the Horde of Horrors.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode03.M_IrisEp3_ChopSuey.name: Chop Suey
GD_IrisEpisode03.M_IrisEp3_ChopSuey.description:
Lacking a sponsor after Piston's betrayal, you are currently unable to rise up in the leaderboards. Mister Torgue has suggested that you head to [place]The Beatdown[-place] and find a new sponsor there.

As it turns out, a gladiator named Pyro Pete has kidnapped the sponsor you've been looking for. You started some trouble for him, so he has agreed to give you his sponsor. Simply go meet him, pretend to be surprised when he attempts to kill you, and then rescue the sponsor.

GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.name: Battle: Bar Room Blitz
GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.description:
Piston has betrayed you. He drugged you, had you taken out of the arena, and convinced everyone that you ran away like a coward.

Unfortunately, since he was also your sponsor, you are currently unable to rise up in the leaderboards. Mister Torgue has suggested that you head to [place]Pyro Pete's[-place] and find a new sponsor there.

As it turns out, a gladiator named Pyro Pete has kidnapped the sponsor you've been looking for. He'll give the sponsor up, but only if you start some trouble in [place]Pyro Pete's[-place].

You have literally no reason to believe he'll keep his word, but, you know. Eh.

GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.name: Tier 2 Battle: Bar Room Blitz
GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.description:
Kill as many badass Bar Patrons as you can in the time given.

Tier 2 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.name: Tier 3 Battle: Bar Room Blitz
GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.description:
Kill as many badass Bar Patrons as you can in the time given.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.name: Tier 3 Rematch: Bar Room Blitz
GD_IrisEpisode03_Battle.M_IrisEp3Battle_.description:
Kill as many badass Bar Patrons as you can in the time given.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_AMontage.name: A Montage
GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_AMontage.description: Moxxi is your new sponsor, and she's as talented at gladiatorial promotion as she is at drawing attention away from her face. And she has a plan for you...

GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_CherryBomb.name: Get Your Motor Running
GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_CherryBomb.description:
The next highest-ranked gladiator on the Torgue leaderboards is named Motor Momma. She's hiding out in the [place]Southen Raceway[-place] and won't reveal herself to any but the most worthy of opponents.

Now that you've gotten her attention, you're free to go meet Motor Momma, and kill the living hell out of her.

GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_TrainningWith.name: Eat Cookies and Crap Thunder
GD_IrisEpisode04.M_IrisEp4_TrainningWith.description:
Moxxi is your new sponsor, and she's as talented at gladiatorial promotion as she is at drawing attention away from her face. She feels that before you can take on the higher-ranked gladiators like Motor Momma and Flyboy, you'll need some training.

Your trainer, as it turns out, is Tiny Tina. She's asked you to head to the Torgue Arena.

GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.name: Battle: The Death Race
GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.description:
The next highest-ranked gladiator on the Torgue leaderboards is named Motor Momma. She's hiding out in the [place]Southern Raceway[-place] and won't reveal herself to any but the most worthy of opponents.
To this end, Moxxi has suggested that you complete an event called The Death Race. As Motor Momma is obsessed with cars, she will almost certainly consider you a worthy opponent if you can beat the clock and complete the time trial.

GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.name: Tier 2 Battle: The Death Race
GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.description: Put the pedal to the metal and complete the time trial.

GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.name: Tier 3 Battle: The Death Race
GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.description: Put the pedal to the metal and complete the time trial.

GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.name: Tier 3 Rematch: The Death Race
GD_IrisEpisode04_Battle.M_IrisEp4Battle_.description: Put the pedal to the metal and complete the time trial.

GD_IrisEpisode05.M_HeavensDoor.name: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
GD_IrisEpisode05.M_HeavensDoor.description:
Only one man stands between you and Piston: a teenage gladiator named Flyboy. Unfortunately, Flyboy's lair is -- to use his words -- ''friggin' impenetrable.''

The best you can hope for is to activate the three access points around the [place]Torgue Forge[-place], which will release some of Flyboy's personal buzzards. Then, you can kill the buzzards and -- if all goes well -- Flyboy will be angry enough to allow you into his lair, where he can kill you personally.

GD_IrisEpisode05.M_IrisEp5_CageMatch.name: Breaking and Entering
GD_IrisEpisode05.M_IrisEp5_CageMatch.description: Only one man stands between you and Piston: a teenage gladiator named Flyboy. Moxxi told you that he was holed up in [place]Torgue Forge[-place] -- better head there and wipe him out.

GD_IrisEpisode05.M_IrisEp5_KickStartMyHe.name: Kickstart My Heart
GD_IrisEpisode05.M_IrisEp5_KickStartMyHe.description:
Only one man stands between you and Piston: a teenage gladiator named Flyboy.

You've angered him, and you now have access to his lair. Get in there and knock him off his pedestal.

GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.name: Battle: Twelve O' Clock High
GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.description:
As it stands, Flyboy has no reason to fight you -- he thinks he's invincible, and he's more focused on taking out Piston than scuffling with lower-ranked fighters like you.

Mister Torgue suggested that you mess up some of Flyboy's buzzards and steal his toys. Once you've done that, Flyboy will get furious and, because he is stupid, allow you into his lair so he can kill you.

But you'll actually kill HIM. That's the TWIST.

GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.name: Tier 2 Battle: Twelve O' Clock High
GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.description:
Destroy the crates on the cargo buzzards and pick up the bling that falls out. Also blow up all the support buzzards that attack you.

Tier 2 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.name: Tier 3 Battle: Twelve O' Clock High
GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.description:
Destroy the crates on the cargo buzzards and pick up the bling that falls out. Also blow up all the support buzzards that attack you.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.name: Tier 3 Rematch: Twelve O' Clock High
GD_IrisEpisode05_Battle.M_IrisEp5Battle_.description:
Destroy the crates on the cargo buzzards and pick up the bling that falls out. Also blow up all the support buzzards that attack you.

Tier 3 Difficulty.

GD_IrisEpisode06.M_IrisEp6_LongWayToTheT.name: Long Way To The Top
GD_IrisEpisode06.M_IrisEp6_LongWayToTheT.description:
Piston is waiting for you in the [place]Torgue Arena[-place].

Kill him.

GD_IrisHUB_GasGuzzlers.M_IrisHUB_GasGuzz.name: Gas Guzzlers
GD_IrisHUB_GasGuzzlers.M_IrisHUB_GasGuzz.description: Sir Hammerlock has heard about a group of mutated rakk out in [place]Southern Raceway[-place]. He's asked you to find them so that he may study them.

GD_IrisHUB_MatterOfTaste.M_IrisHUB_Matte.name: Matter Of Taste
GD_IrisHUB_MatterOfTaste.M_IrisHUB_Matte.description: Some wannabe critics in [place]Southern Raceway[-place] negatively reviewed some of Mister Torgue's favorite ECHO simulation games. In a haze of illogical fury, he ordered you to head to [place]Southern Raceway[-place] and kill the reviewers on his behalf.

GD_IrisHUB_MonsterHunter.M_IrisHUB_Monst.name: Monster Hunter
GD_IrisHUB_MonsterHunter.M_IrisHUB_Monst.description: Mister Torgue has asked you to hunt down a vicious monster out in [place]Southern Raceway[-place].

GD_IrisHUB_SmackTalk.M_IrisHUB_SmackTalk.name: Interview with a Vault Hunter
GD_IrisHUB_SmackTalk.M_IrisHUB_SmackTalk.description: Moxxi recorded a bunch of interviews with Mister Torgue (wherein she talked about what an unrepentant badass you are), but the interview tapes have gone missing. She's asked you to find them and return them to her.

GD_IrisHUB_WalkTheDog.M_IrisHUB_WalkTheD.name: Walking the Dog
GD_IrisHUB_WalkTheDog.M_IrisHUB_WalkTheD.description: Tiny Tina needs you to take her dog, Enrique, out for a walk. She's asked you to find him and release him from his cage.

GD_IrisHUB_Wanted.M_IrisHUB_Wanted.name: Everybody Wants to be Wanted
GD_IrisHUB_Wanted.M_IrisHUB_Wanted.description: In an effort to psyche out the other gladiators in the Torgue tournament, Moxxi has asked you to plaster some of your own wanted posters in [place]Southern Raceway[-place].

GD_IrisRaidBoss.M_Iris_RaidPete.name: Pete the Invincible
GD_IrisRaidBoss.M_Iris_RaidPete.description:
Pete has been training since you last faced him. Get a group of friends and take him down a second time.

Learn how to trigger the appearance of Pete the Invincible. Very hard, bring a friend.

GD_Lobelia_TestingZone.M_TestingZone.name: A History of Simulated Violence
GD_Lobelia_TestingZone.M_TestingZone.description:
Patricia Tannis has set up a training course for the Crimson Raiders of Sanctuary. Tannis filled the gauntlet, situated on [place]Digistruct Peak[-place], with dozens of digital reconstructions of Pandoran baddies.

Her goal is simple: she will record your biometric data as you fight your way through the gauntlet. Then, by using a combination of digistruct technology and Eridium engineering, she will give you the power of a god.

Come to think of it, perhaps ''simple'' wasn't the right word.

GD_Lobelia_TestingZone.M_TestingZoneRepe.name: More History of Simulated Violence
GD_Lobelia_TestingZone.M_TestingZoneRepe.description:
Patricia Tannis has set up a training course for the Crimson Raiders of Sanctuary. Tannis filled the gauntlet, situated on [place]Digistruct Peak[-place], with dozens of digital reconstructions of Pandoran baddies.

Her goal is simple: she will record your biometric data as you fight your way through the gauntlet. Then, by using a combination of digistruct technology and Eridium engineering, she will give you the power of a god.

Come to think of it, perhaps ''simple'' wasn't the right word.

GD_Lobelia_UnlockDoor.M_Lobelia_UnlockDo.name: Dr. T and the Vault Hunters
GD_Lobelia_UnlockDoor.M_Lobelia_UnlockDo.description:
Patricia Tannis has set up a training course for the Crimson Raiders of Sanctuary. Tannis filled the gauntlet, situated on [place]Digistruct Peak[-place], with dozens of digital reconstructions of Pandoran baddies.

Before you can enter the gauntlet, however, Tannis has a task for you: you must open a door.

GD_Nast_Easter_Plot_M01.M_Nast_Easter.name: Fun, Sun, and Guns
GD_Nast_Easter_Plot_M01.M_Nast_Easter.description: Sir Hammerlock has summoned you to [place]Wam Bam Island[-place] for a weekend of fun. Go find him and the festivities can commence!

GD_Nast_Vday_Mission_Plot.M_Nast_Vday.name: A Match Made on Pandora
GD_Nast_Vday_Mission_Plot.M_Nast_Vday.description: Moxxi has summoned you to [place]Rotgut Distillery[-place] -- sounds like she needs some help with the old Hodunk/Zaford rivalry. Better find her.

GD_Nast_Vday_Mission_Side01.M_Nast_Vday_.name: Learning to Love
GD_Nast_Vday_Mission_Side01.M_Nast_Vday_.description: Something's going on with Innuendobot 5000. Moxxi has asked you to speak with him.

GD_Orchid_Plot.M_Orchid_PlotMission01.name: A Warm Welcome
GD_Orchid_Plot.M_Orchid_PlotMission01.description: You begin your search for the Treasure of the Sands at the desert town of [place]Oasis[-place]. As it happens, [place]Oasis[-place] is currently under attack by pirates, who claim to work for someone called Sandman. A man named Shade, presumably a resident of [place]Oasis[-place], has asked you to clear out the town.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission02.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: My Life For A Sandskiff
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission02.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: Shade has suggested that, if you are to find the Lost Treasure of the Sands, you will need to meet up with a pirate queen named Captain Scarlett. Scarlett lives out in [place]Wurmwater[-place], which -- full disclosure -- contains no water. You'll need a hovercraft to reach [place]Wurmwater[-place], but thankfully, Shade has agreed to let you borrow his.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission03.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: A Study in Scarlett
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission03.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: According to Shade, you'll need to find a woman named Captain Scarlett if you want to find the Lost Treasure of the Sands. Scarlett and her band of pirates are set up in [place]Wurmwater[-place] -- use your hovercraft to reach her.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission04.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: Two Easy Pieces
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission04.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description:
Scarlett says that there is only one way to find Captain Blade's lost treasure -- you'll have to collect the four pieces of Blade's compass, and reassemble it. Once you've done that, the compass will (somehow) point the way to the Lost Treasure. Scarlett has one of the pieces, but she needs you to find the others.

To this end, Scarlett has asked you to find and kill Sandman. Not just because he's a jerk, mind you, but because he has one of the pieces of Blade's compass. He's somewhere out in [place]Hayter's Folly.[-place].

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission05.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: The Hermit
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission05.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: Scarlett knows where to find the final piece of Captain Blade's compass. She has told you that Herbert, a former crewman of hers who lives out in [place]the Rustyards[-place], is obsessed with lore surrounding the Treasure of the Sands. If you find him, she says, he'll be able to point you toward the last compass piece.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission06.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: Crazy About You
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission06.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: Herbert, like many people on Pandora, refuses to help you find the final piece of Captain Blade's compass until you do a favor for him. He has also -- again, like many people on Pandora -- hidden a few audio recordings in the areas surrounding his home in [place]the Rustyards[-place]. He has asked you to return his recordings. Once you've done so, he'll be happy to lead you to the final piece of Captain Blade's compass.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission07.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: Whoops
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission07.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: In attempting to remove the final piece of Captain Blade's compass from a chest, you inadvertently blasted said compass piece to bits. Herbert, feeling mildly upset about the whole situation, has offered to help you. If you can find a few samples of poly-kryten from the [place]Washburne Refinery[-place], Herbert will be able to replace the compass part you kind-of-sort-of destroyed.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission08.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: Let There Be Light
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission08.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: Now that you've found all the pieces of Captain Blade's compass, there's only one thing to do: take the reassembled compass to [place]Magnys Lighthouse[-place]. Scarlett says that if you activate Blade's compass at the top of the lighthouse, the true location of the Treasure of the Sands will be revealed to you. So, you've got that going for you. Which is nice.

GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission09.M_Orchid_PlotMi.name: X Marks The Spot
GD_Orchid_Plot_Mission09.M_Orchid_PlotMi.description: Thanks to your efforts in [place]Magnys Lighthouse[-place], a big ol' beam of light is pointing at a particular spot in the [place]Wurmwater[-place] -- more than likely, this is where the Treasure of the Sands is buried. Captain Scarlett has asked you to meet her there -- together, the two of you will fight your way to the treasure, before eventually dueling one another to see who actually gets to keep it.

GD_Orchid_Raid.M_Orchid_Raid1.name: Hyperius the Invincible
GD_Orchid_Raid.M_Orchid_Raid1.description: After the opening of the Vault, more and more dangerous alien creatures have awakened on Pandora. They are unique. They are magnificent. They are going to drop some REALLY good loot if you kill them. Better bring your friends, though: the Seraphs aren't gonna go down easily.

GD_Orchid_Raid.M_Orchid_Raid3.name: Master Gee the Invincible
GD_Orchid_Raid.M_Orchid_Raid3.description: After the opening of the Vault, more and more dangerous alien creatures have awakened on Pandora. They are unique. They are magnificent. They are going to drop some REALLY good loot if you kill them. Better bring your friends, though: the Seraphs aren't gonna go down easily.

GD_Orchid_SM_BuryPast.M_Orchid_BuryingTh.name: Burying the Past
GD_Orchid_SM_BuryPast.M_Orchid_BuryingTh.description: Aubrey Callahan III is the great-granddaughter of a vicious pirate queen. As one might imagine, such a fact might put a crimp in one's reputation and job prospects. For this reason, Aubrey has hired you to destroy her great-grandma's old pirate ship, the Kronus, subsequently destroying all evidence of her gram's murderous existence.

GD_Orchid_SM_Declaration.M_Orchid_Declar.name: Declaration Against Independents
GD_Orchid_SM_Declaration.M_Orchid_Declar.description: Evidently, pirates have a union -- who knew? The union members of [place]Wurmwater[-place] aren't too happy to see a scab (you) muscling in on their territory, and so they've challenged you to a fight.

GD_Orchid_SM_Deserters.M_Orchid_Deserter.name: Just Desserts for Desert Deserters
GD_Orchid_SM_Deserters.M_Orchid_Deserter.description: Captain Scarlett doesn't take kindly to those who desert her crew. She's asked you to track down the deserters and kill them.

GD_Orchid_SM_EndGameClone.M_Orchid_EndGa.name: Treasure of the Sands
GD_Orchid_SM_EndGameClone.M_Orchid_EndGa.description: You may have defeated the Leviathan and found the lost Treasure of the Sands, but there's no reason to let a little thing like reality get in the way of you doing it all over again!

GD_Orchid_SM_FireWater.M_Orchid_FireWate.name: Fire Water
GD_Orchid_SM_FireWater.M_Orchid_FireWate.description: Frank, a corpse whom Shade imagines to be a growly alcoholic, needs some whiskey. Shade has asked you to collect a bottle of the stuff, and deliver it to Frank. How Shade expects Frank's corpse to drink the whiskey is anyone's guess.

GD_Orchid_SM_FloppyCopy.M_Orchid_DontCop.name: Don't Copy That Floppy
GD_Orchid_SM_FloppyCopy.M_Orchid_DontCop.description: You found a malfunctioning Hyperion loader named C3n50r807 in the [place]Washburne Refinery[-place]. He seems to be obsessed with censoring all ''immoral'' behavior on Pandora. As of now, the censorbot has set his sights on software piracy. Some pirates in the area possess bootleg copies of ECHO simulation programs; the censorbot wants you to kill the pirates and get the software back.

GD_Orchid_SM_Freedom.M_Orchid_FreedomOfS.name: Freedom of Speech
GD_Orchid_SM_Freedom.M_Orchid_FreedomOfS.description: You found a malfunctioning Hyperion loader named C3n50r807 in the [place]Washburne Refinery[-place]. He seems to be obsessed with censoring all ''immoral'' behavior on Pandora. In this instance, the censorbot has asked you to wage war on the concept of profanity. A bandit DJ plans on broadcasting a stream of profanity from a radio tower -- the censorbot has asked you to find the DJ, and kill him before he can curse on the air.

GD_Orchid_SM_Grendel.M_Orchid_Grendel.name: Grendel
GD_Orchid_SM_Grendel.M_Orchid_Grendel.description: A fearsome creature is hiding out in [place]Hayter's Folly[-place]. Sir Hammerlock, a zoologist and master huntsman, has asked you to track down this creature and kill it.

GD_Orchid_SM_JockoLegUp.M_Orchid_JockoLe.name: Giving Jocko A Leg Up
GD_Orchid_SM_JockoLegUp.M_Orchid_JockoLe.description: Shade's not-dead friend, Jocko, dreams of being a sand pirate. Shade has asked you to collect some pirate-y prosthetics -- peg legs, teeth, and so on -- so that Jocko may achieve his dreams. You'll have to kill some pirates and collect the required accessories from their corpses.

GD_Orchid_SM_KnowIt.M_Orchid_KnowItWhenS.name: I Know It When I See It
GD_Orchid_SM_KnowIt.M_Orchid_KnowItWhenS.description: A malfunctioning Hyperion loader calling itself C3n50r807 has offered you a job. He knows of a robot named P3RV-E who is in possession of pornographic materials. C3n50r807 wants you to find P3RV-E, kill him, and collect the illicit materials.

GD_Orchid_SM_MansBestFriend.M_Orchid_Man.name: Man's Best Friend
GD_Orchid_SM_MansBestFriend.M_Orchid_Man.description: Aubrey Callahan III's grandmother was close friends with the fearsome Captain Blade. When he died he left Aubrey's grandmother his pet stalker. Now that Aubrey's grandma is dead, however, she has inherited a vicious pet she never wanted. She's asked you to kill the stalker.

GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.name: Message in a Bottle
GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.description: You found a note in a sealed bottle, pointing you toward some hidden treasure in [place]Oasis[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.name: Message in a Bottle
GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.description: You found a note in a sealed bottle, pointing you toward some hidden treasure in [place]Wurmwater[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.name: Message in a Bottle
GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.description: You found a note in a sealed bottle, pointing you toward some hidden treasure in [place]Hayter's Folly[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.name: Message in a Bottle
GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.description: You found a note in a sealed bottle, pointing you toward some hidden treasure somewhere around [place]Magnys Lighthouse[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.name: Message In A Bottle
GD_Orchid_SM_Message.M_Orchid_MessageInA.description: You found a note in a sealed bottle, pointing you toward some hidden treasure somewhere around [place]Magnys Lighthouse[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Race.M_Orchid_Race.name: Faster Than the Speed of Love
GD_Orchid_SM_Race.M_Orchid_Race.description: Natalie, Shade's flirtatious female alter-ego, wants you to complete a timed race out in [place]Wurmwater[-place]. Grab yourself a sandskiff and let the fun begin!

GD_Orchid_SM_Scurvy.M_Orchid_ScurvyDogs.name: Ye Scurvy Dogs
GD_Orchid_SM_Scurvy.M_Orchid_ScurvyDogs.description: Scurvy is a killer. Not much of a killer as, say, bullets, starvation, or explosions, but, still -- a killer is a killer. To this end, Mercer has asked you to collect some fruit for the crew.

GD_Orchid_SM_Smells.M_Orchid_SmellsLikeV.name: Smells Like Victory
GD_Orchid_SM_Smells.M_Orchid_SmellsLikeV.description: Mercer, the cook for Scarlett's crew, needs you to get rid of the smelly radio operator Shiv-Spike. As Scarlett prefers her executions lively and interesting, Mercer has asked you to feed Shiv-Spike to a sandworm. This leads to another problem, however, Shiv-Spike smells like the inside of a dead skag. You'll need to find some condiments to make him a bit more appetizing.

GD_Orchid_SM_Tetanus.M_Orchid_CatchRideT.name: Catch-A-Ride, and Also Tetanus
GD_Orchid_SM_Tetanus.M_Orchid_CatchRideT.description: The city of [place]Sanctuary[-place] needs a constant supply of scrap metal to keep its engines active. Scooter, the mechanic of [place]Sanctuary[-place], has hired you to collect some scrap from the [place]Rustyards[-place].

GD_Orchid_SM_Wingman.M_Orchid_Wingman.name: Wingman
GD_Orchid_SM_Wingman.M_Orchid_Wingman.description: Shade wants to propose to a woman named Natalie. Unfortunately, he's lost the engagement ring. If you can find the ring and propose to Natalie on Shade's behalf, you'll have made him the happiest insane quasi-necrophiliac on Pandora.

GD_Sage_Ep1.M_Sage_Mission01.name: Savage Lands
GD_Sage_Ep1.M_Sage_Mission01.description: Sir Hammerlock has invited you to the swampy continent of Aegrus for a weekend of exploration, hunting, and friendship. You've just arrived -- time to find Hammerlock.

GD_Sage_Ep3.M_Sage_Mission03.name: Professor Nakayama, I Presume?
GD_Sage_Ep3.M_Sage_Mission03.description: Sir Hammerlock has organized your first hunt. You must travel to [place]Scylla's Grove[-place] and kill an unusual creature that has been spotted roaming the area.

GD_Sage_Ep4.M_Sage_Mission04.name: A-Hunting We Will Go
GD_Sage_Ep4.M_Sage_Mission04.description: Professor Nakayama is planning on creating Eridium engineered Jack clones from his secret lab in [place]Ardorton Station[-place]. Claptrap has suggested that you travel there and destroy his samples of Jack's DNA. How he managed to get Jack's DNA is a whole other matter, but either way, destroy them and shut down his lab.

GD_Sage_Ep5.M_Sage_Mission05.name: The Fall of Nakayama
GD_Sage_Ep5.M_Sage_Mission05.description:
Since you foiled all his other plans, Nakayama has no choice but to get inside his ship, the H.S.S. Terminus, and unleash the monstrosity inside. You need to get to the Terminus first and stop him, or everyone on Pandora will die.

Or something.

Claptrap has told you the code to get inside the ship is 1-3-4.

GD_Sage_Raid.M_Sage_Raid.name: Voracidous the Invincible
GD_Sage_Raid.M_Sage_Raid.description:
There is a really, really big Stalker somewhere in Aegrus and, like all really, really big things on Pandora, it needs to be killed. Are you and your friends up to the task?

An Aegran warlock named Chief Ngwatu has found, and managed to control, a powerful creature named Voracidous. It's unclear where it came from or how the Chief is controlling, but the Savage Murderers believe it's a god. They consider Chief Ngwatu a heretic for attempting to control their deity, and they've made it their goal to kill Ngwatu and unleash Voracidous's true power.

GD_Sage_SM_AcquiredTaste.M_Sage_Acquired.name: An Acquired Taste
GD_Sage_SM_AcquiredTaste.M_Sage_Acquired.description: Hammerlock has tracked down a borok with a taste for human flesh. He wants you to get rid of it, obviously.

GD_Sage_SM_BigFeet.M_Sage_BigFeet.name: Big Feet
GD_Sage_SM_BigFeet.M_Sage_BigFeet.description: There are triangular footprints leading away from Hammerlock's lodge. Hammerlock has suggested you track the footprints to their source, and do combat with whatever caused them.

GD_Sage_SM_BorokCage.M_Sage_BorokCage.name: Still Just a Borok in a Cage
GD_Sage_SM_BorokCage.M_Sage_BorokCage.description: An auteur documentarian named Dietmar Von Heinrichzimmerschneit has made you the subject of his documentary. He wants you to go find a creature he has named ''Der Monstrositat'' and capture it in a cage.

GD_Sage_SM_DahliaMurder.M_Sage_DahliaMur.name: The Rakk Dahlia Murder
GD_Sage_SM_DahliaMurder.M_Sage_DahliaMur.description: A rare creature named Rakkanoth will only leave his lair upon seeing bright lights, and hearing stupidly loud noises. To this end, Claptrap has set up some fireworks outside Rakkanoth's lair. He needs you to fire them off, then kill Rakkanoth once it appears.

GD_Sage_SM_EggOnFace.M_Sage_EggOnFace.name: Egg on Your Face
GD_Sage_SM_EggOnFace.M_Sage_EggOnFace.description:
Dietmar Von Heinrichzimmerschneit needs footage of you collecting eggs.

That's it, really.

GD_Sage_SM_FollowGlow.M_Sage_FollowGlow.name: Follow The Glow
GD_Sage_SM_FollowGlow.M_Sage_FollowGlow.description: Claptrap has spotted the skag who peed all over his grove. He wants you to rid Pandora of the skag's urine-soaked evil for good.

GD_Sage_SM_Nakarama.M_Sage_Nakayamarama.name: Nakayama-rama
GD_Sage_SM_Nakarama.M_Sage_Nakayamarama.description: Professor Nakayama recorded some audio diaries before he came to Aegrus. Claptrap has suggested you find them, as it never hurts to know a little bit more about your opponent.

GD_Sage_SM_NowYouSeeIt.M_Sage_NowYouSeeI.name: Now You See It
GD_Sage_SM_NowYouSeeIt.M_Sage_NowYouSeeI.description:
There is a fearsome stalker known as Bloodtail who can only be attracted by a certain kind of pheromone. Hammerlock has offered you a vial of the pheromone in question.

Whenever you're ready, Hammerlock wants you to apply the pheromone and go a-hunting for Bloodtail.

GD_Sage_SM_OldPukey.M_Sage_OldPukey.name: Ol' Pukey
GD_Sage_SM_OldPukey.M_Sage_OldPukey.description: Claptrap has picked up an ECHO blip from what he believes to be an old CL4P-TP unit. As he is more than a little eager for some robotic companionship, he wants you to track the signal and rescue the CL4P-TP.

GD_Sage_SM_PallingAround.M_Sage_PallingA.name: Palling Around
GD_Sage_SM_PallingAround.M_Sage_PallingA.description: Sir Hammerlock has found an armored bullymong hiding in [place]Hunter's Grotto[-place]. As you are a courageous slayer of creatures, he assumed you might wish to track him down.

GD_Sage_SM_RareSpawns.M_Sage_RareSpawns.name: I Like My Monsters Rare
GD_Sage_SM_RareSpawns.M_Sage_RareSpawns.description: A quasi-friendly Aegran named Thirstblood has tasked you with hunting down several extremely rare creatures. There's no real way to know when or where the creatures will appear, Thirstblood says, so just keep your eyes open and your gun loaded.

GD_Sage_SM_Urine.M_Sage_Urine.name: Urine, You're Out
GD_Sage_SM_Urine.M_Sage_Urine.description: A particularly incontinent skag has been marking his territory all around Claptrap's grove. Even though he does not have a sense of smell, Claptrap would like you to wash off the urine so he won't be attacked and eaten by angry skags. Oh, and the skag's tinkle juice is only visible at night. Have fun!

GD_Z1_Assasinate.M_AssasinateTheAssassin.name: Assassinate the Assassins
GD_Z1_Assasinate.M_AssasinateTheAssassin.description: Roland suspects that four Hyperion assassins are hiding out in [place]Southpaw Steam & Power[-place]. He's asked any Crimson Raiders in the area (that means you) to find the disguised assassins and kill them.

GD_Z1_BadHairDay.M_BadHairDay.name: Bad Hair Day
GD_Z1_BadHairDay.M_BadHairDay.description: Sir Hammerlock asked you to find some bullymong fur so he may decorate his hat with it. In order to collect the fur from the bullymongs, you'll have to weaken them with gunfire, then finish them off with a melee attack.

GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter1.name: Bandit Slaughter: Round 1
GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter1.description: You've found Moxxi's first Circle of Slaughter, run by a bandit named Fink. [place]Fink's Slaughterhouse[-place] is, perhaps unsurprisingly, full of murderous bandits. You'll have to survive five separate rounds, each with multiple waves of enemies.

GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter2.name: Bandit Slaughter: Round 2
GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter2.description: You've found Moxxi's first Circle of Slaughter, run by a bandit named Fink. [place]Fink's Slaughterhouse[-place] is, perhaps unsurprisingly, full of murderous bandits. You'll have to survive five separate rounds, each with multiple waves of enemies.

GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter3.name: Bandit Slaughter: Round 3
GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter3.description: You've found Moxxi's first Circle of Slaughter, run by a bandit named Fink. [place]Fink's Slaughterhouse[-place] is, perhaps unsurprisingly, full of murderous bandits. You'll have to survive five separate rounds, each with multiple waves of enemies.

GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter4.name: Bandit Slaughter: Round 4
GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter4.description: You've found Moxxi's first Circle of Slaughter, run by a bandit named Fink. [place]Fink's Slaughterhouse[-place] is, perhaps unsurprisingly, full of murderous bandits. You'll have to survive five separate rounds, each with multiple waves of enemies.

GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter5.name: Bandit Slaughter: Round 5
GD_Z1_BanditSlaughter.M_BanditSlaughter5.description: You've found Moxxi's first Circle of Slaughter, run by a bandit named Fink. [place]Fink's Slaughterhouse[-place] is, perhaps unsurprisingly, full of murderous bandits. You'll have to survive five separate rounds, each with multiple waves of enemies.

GD_Z1_BearerBadNews.M_BearerBadNews.name: Bearer of Bad News
GD_Z1_BearerBadNews.M_BearerBadNews.description: Handsome Jack murdered Roland. His friends, both within [place]Sanctuary[-place] and without, have not yet been notified. Mordecai has asked you to break the news to them.

GD_Z1_BFFs.M_BFFs.name: BFFs
GD_Z1_BFFs.M_BFFs.description: Four small-time thugs are arguing over who stole a large amount of the group's money. Only ONE of the thugs is telling the truth. The rest are lying. You must work out who stole the money and shoot the lying bastard.

GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_EternalFlame.name: Cult Following: Eternal Flame
GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_EternalFlame.description: Lilith has asked you to infiltrate a clan of cultists who worship her as a goddess. As far as Lilith's concerned, this could be awesome, creepy, or both -- she's asked you to investigate the clan from the inside to see if they're up to anything creepy. You'll have to speak to the cult leader, Incinerator Clayton, to become a cultist.

GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_FalseIdols.name: Cult Following: False Idols
GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_FalseIdols.description: Incinerator Clayton has asked you to kill Scorch, a demigod (his words) who is stealing (also his words) followers from the Firehawk, despite the fact that Lilith doesn't give a spiderant's patootie about who worships her (not his words).

GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_LightingTheMat.name: Cult Following: Lighting the Match
GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_LightingTheMat.description: Incinerator Clayton wants you to take a mass-murdering midget named Matchstick to the freighter in [place]Southern Shelf[-place], put him in the mouth of the mechanized dragon head at the ship's prow, and then burn him alive. To the Children of the Firehawk, this is not punishment -- this is a reward.

GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_TheEnkindling.name: Cult Following: The Enkindling
GD_Z1_ChildrenOfPhoenix.M_TheEnkindling.description: Lilith is relatively sure that the Children of the Firehawk are harmless, but she wants you to investigate this whole ''Enkindling'' thing before you let the cult off the hook entirely.

GD_Z1_ClapTrapStash.M_ClapTrapStash.name: Claptrap's Secret Stash
GD_Z1_ClapTrapStash.M_ClapTrapStash.description: Claptrap is willing to grant you access to his secret stash in [place]Sanctuary[-place], but only if you're willing to jump through a few (hundred) hoops for him.

GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.name: You Are Cordially Invited: Party Prep
GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.description: Tiny Tina's got a tea party coming up in [place]Tundra Express[-place], and she needs you to find her date: Sir Reginald Von Bartlesby. She believes he's being held captive by his mother. She'll also need you to get some fixin's for the tea party -- buzzard shrapnel, crumpets, and the like.

GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.name: You Are Cordially Invited: RSVP
GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.description: Tiny Tina wants to throw a tea party in [place]Tundra Express[-place], but she's missing the guest of honor. She needs you to find him and lure him to her place. To attract Flesh-Stick, you'll need to shoot at him every once in a while. Keep him angry enough to follow you, but don't kill him.

GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.name: You Are Cordially Invited: Tea Party
GD_Z1_CordiallyInvited.M_CordiallyInvite.description: Tina is throwing a tea party in [place]Tundra Express[-place] for a vicious, hateful bandit named Flesh-Stick. Better kill any aggressors so the two can have their privacy.

GD_Z1_HandsomeJackHere.M_HandsomeJackHer.name: Handsome Jack Here!
GD_Z1_HandsomeJackHere.M_HandsomeJackHer.description: You found one of Helena Pierce's final audio logs in [place]Southern Shelf[-place], recorded just before her disappearance. Sir Hammerlock is curious of Pierce's ultimate fate and wants you to find the rest of the audio logs.

GD_Z1_HiddenJournalsFurniture.M_HiddenJo.name: Torture Chairs
GD_Z1_HiddenJournalsFurniture.M_HiddenJo.description: Years ago, Handsome Jack tortured Patricia Tannis and stole the Vault Key from her. Tannis, for some reason, wants you to find her missing journals wherein she chronicles what Jack and his men did to her.

GD_Z1_IceManCometh.M_IceManCometh.name: The Ice Man Cometh
GD_Z1_IceManCometh.M_IceManCometh.description: The bandits out in [place]Three Horns Divide[-place] have been harassing travelers for years. Thankfully, Claptrap has a plan: if you can shut down all of the bandits' furnaces, Claptrap believes the bandits will get so cold that they'll have to run indoors just to avoid freezing to death.

GD_Z1_InMemoriam.M_InMemoriam.name: In Memoriam
GD_Z1_InMemoriam.M_InMemoriam.description: Lilith faked her death a couple of years ago in order to throw Hyperion off her scent. Unfortunately, a particularly enterprising bandit in [place]Three Horns Divide[-place] managed to bug Lilith's hideout and plans to sell the recordings to Hyperion. You must find this man and kill him.

GD_Z1_MightyMorphin.M_MightyMorphin.name: Mighty Morphin'
GD_Z1_MightyMorphin.M_MightyMorphin.description: Sir Hammerlock would like you to find some varkids in [place]Tundra Express[-place], force them to morph, and then inject their cocoons with a special serum so he can study their morphing qualities. Be careful, though; a varkid won't morph if it is the last one left alive, and you can only inject regular varkid pods. Badass pods won't work.

GD_Z1_MineAllMine.M_MineAllMine.name: Mine, All Mine
GD_Z1_MineAllMine.M_MineAllMine.description: Lilith has asked you to investigate an Eridium mine in [place]Tundra Express[-place]. Given how dangerous unrefined Eridium can be in the wrong hands -- which is to say, any hands that aren't Lilith's, Roland's, or yours -- Lilith has asked you to exterminate the bandits at the mine and find out where they're sending the Eridium.

gd_z1_minecartmischief.M_MinecartMischie.name: Minecart Mischief
gd_z1_minecartmischief.M_MinecartMischie.description: You found an ECHO explaining that all minerals must be pulverised by the rock crusher at the end of the mining track. If you can get the mineral chunk to the rock crusher, you'll be able to get at whatever goodies it holds.

GD_Z1_NameGame.M_NameGame.name: The Name Game
GD_Z1_NameGame.M_NameGame.description: Sir Hammerlock isn't happy with the name ''bullymong'' and would like you to help him come up with a better name for the species before he publishes his almanac of Pandora's wildlife. He's asked you to head to [place]Three Horns Divide[-place] and examine the bullymongs (using violence, of course) so he may study them and come up with a better name.

gd_z1_nohardfeelings.M_NoHardFeelings.name: No Hard Feelings
gd_z1_nohardfeelings.M_NoHardFeelings.description: A bandit you killed wishes (or wished?) to posthumously award you a cache of guns in [place]Tundra Express[-place]. You've just gotta collect 'em.

GD_Z1_NoVacancy.BalanceDefs.M_NoVacancy.name: No Vacancy
GD_Z1_NoVacancy.BalanceDefs.M_NoVacancy.description: You found the abandoned [place]Happy Pig Motel[-place]. Scooter has asked you to turn the town's power back on so you can use the motel's vending machines and bounty board.

GD_Z1_PerfectlyPeaceful.M_PerfectlyPeace.name: Perfectly Peaceful
GD_Z1_PerfectlyPeaceful.M_PerfectlyPeace.description: Sir Hammerlock is eager to find out how the crystalisks came to be. He is willing to pay you for evidence of their origins. Hammerlock has suggested you start looking in [place]Caustic Caverns[-place].

GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.name: Rock, Paper, Genocide: Slag Weapons!
GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.description: Marcus wants your help testing out the new slag weapons he's purchased.

GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.name: Rock, Paper, Genocide: Corrosive Weapons!
GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.description: Marcus has some corrosive weapons ready for you to try out.

GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.name: Rock, Paper, Genocide: Fire Weapons!
GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.description: Marcus has some fire weapons ready for you to try out.

GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.name: Rock, Paper, Genocide: Shock Weapons!
GD_Z1_RockPaperGenocide.M_RockPaperGenoc.description: Marcus has some shock weapons ready for you to try out.

GD_Z1_ShootMeInTheFace.M_ShootMeInTheFac.name: Shoot This Guy in the Face
GD_Z1_ShootMeInTheFace.M_ShootMeInTheFac.description: A psycho in [place]Thousand Cuts[-place] has asked you to shoot him in the face.

GD_Z1_Surgery.M_PerformSurgery.name: Do No Harm
GD_Z1_Surgery.M_PerformSurgery.description: Dr. Zed's patient needs surgery badly. Dr. Zed has asked you to help him with the procedure.

GD_Z1_Symbiosis.M_Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
GD_Z1_Symbiosis.M_Symbiosis.description: Sir Hammerlock has heard rumors of a midget hiding out within [place]Southern Shelf Bay[-place], who formed a symbiotic relationship with a bullymong. He's asked you to find it and kill it.

GD_Z1_ThisTown.M_ThisTown.name: This Town Ain't Big Enough
GD_Z1_ThisTown.M_ThisTown.description: Sir Hammerlock asked you to rid [place]Liar's Berg[-place] of bullymongs. While the residents of the town were murdered by bandits weeks ago, Hammerlock nonetheless feels that their former homes should not be torn up by feces-tossing ape creatures.

GD_Z1_TrainRobbery.M_TrainRobbery.name: The Pretty Good Train Robbery
GD_Z1_TrainRobbery.M_TrainRobbery.description: Lilith discovered that some of the Hyperion trains heading through [place]Tundra Express[-place] carry a buttload of cash. If you can stop one of the trains and blow it open, you'll be able to steal the cash it's carrying.

GD_Z1_WontGetFooled.M_WontGetFooled.name: Won't Get Fooled Again
GD_Z1_WontGetFooled.M_WontGetFooled.description: Marshall Friedman needs your help: one of the identical Gutter quadruplets murdered a boy in town, and Friedman doesn't know which one. You'll have to question the witnesses and use your deductive skills if you want to discover the true perpetrator.

GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_ArmLeg.name: A Real Boy: Face Time
GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_ArmLeg.description: Mal believes that having human body parts will complete his robot-to-human transformation. He's asked you to collect some.

GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_Clothes.name: A Real Boy: Clothes Make the Man
GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_Clothes.description: A malfunctioning Hyperion loader has asked you to help him become human. For some reason, the loader believes that clothes, rather than blood, a soul, or independent thought, are all that stands between him and true humanity.

GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_Human.name: A Real Boy: Human
GD_Z2_ARealBoy.M_ARealBoy_Human.description: Mal now believes that the only way to become human is to kill other humans. Defend yourself.

GD_Z2_ArmsDealer.M_ArmsDealer.name: Arms Dealing
GD_Z2_ArmsDealer.M_ArmsDealer.description: Zed has placed several orders with a prominent arms dealer named Varnell. These orders have just arrived in [place]The Highlands[-place], and Zed needs you to pick them up before they go bad. How exactly weapons can ''go bad,'' Zed neglected to explain.

GD_Z2_BlowTheBridge.M_BlowTheBridge.name: 3:10 to Kaboom
GD_Z2_BlowTheBridge.M_BlowTheBridge.description: The sheriff of [place]Lynchwood[-place] sends every ounce of Eridium from the town mines to her boyfriend, Handsome Jack. Brick wants you to destroy the train she uses to transport this Eridium. First, you'll have to find a small demolition transport and snag it for yourself.

GD_Z2_ClaptrapBirthdayBash.M_ClaptrapBir.name: Claptrap's Birthday Bash!
GD_Z2_ClaptrapBirthdayBash.M_ClaptrapBir.description: It's been seven years since Claptrap was first built, and he wants to celebrate the occasion. He's asked you to invite some of his closest friends to his birthday bash in [place]Sanctuary[-place]. Once you've done that, all you need to do is have fun at the party!

GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.name: Creature Slaughter: Round 1
GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.description: You've stumbled upon Moxxi's second Circle of Slaughter. This [place]Natural Selection Annex[-place], run by Captain Cabrera, specializes in creatures. Can you survive the waves of snarling, growling hatred Cabrera will throw at you?

GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.name: Creature Slaughter: Round 2
GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.description: You've stumbled upon Moxxi's second Circle of Slaughter. This [place]Natural Selection Annex[-place], run by Captain Cabrera, specializes in creatures. Can you survive the waves of snarling, growling hatred Cabrera will throw at you?

GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.name: Creature Slaughter: Round 3
GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.description: You've stumbled upon Moxxi's second Circle of Slaughter. This [place]Natural Selection Annex[-place], run by Captain Cabrera, specializes in creatures. Can you survive the waves of snarling, growling hatred Cabrera will throw at you?

GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.name: Creature Slaughter: Round 4
GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.description: You've stumbled upon Moxxi's second Circle of Slaughter. This [place]Natural Selection Annex[-place], run by Captain Cabrera, specializes in creatures. Can you survive the waves of snarling, growling hatred Cabrera will throw at you?

GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.name: Creature Slaughter: Round 5
GD_Z2_CreatureSlaughter.M_CreatureSlaugh.description: You've stumbled upon Moxxi's second Circle of Slaughter. This [place]Natural Selection Annex[-place], run by Captain Cabrera, specializes in creatures. Can you survive the waves of snarling, growling hatred Cabrera will throw at you?

GD_Z2_DefendSlabTower.M_DefendSlabTower.name: Defend Slab Tower
GD_Z2_DefendSlabTower.M_DefendSlabTower.description: Every once in a while, a Hyperion supply drop accidentally lands in Brick's territory. Hyperion is planning to send a small army of bots to retrieve or destroy the stray supply drop, and Brick has asked you to help him defend it.

GD_Z2_DemonHunter.M_DemonHunter.name: Demon Hunter
GD_Z2_DemonHunter.M_DemonHunter.description: There are reports of a demon murdering the townsfolk of [place]Lynchwood[-place]. You have been hired to destroy it.

GD_Z2_DoctorsOrders.M_DoctorsOrders.name: Doctor's Orders
GD_Z2_DoctorsOrders.M_DoctorsOrders.description: Patricia Tannis needs you to collect some information on slag experimentation. It'll get kinda dark, to be entirely honest with you.

GD_Z2_DuelingBanjos.M_DuelingBanjos.name: Clan War: Zafords vs. Hodunks
GD_Z2_DuelingBanjos.M_DuelingBanjos.description: The family feud has reached a boiling point. The Zafords and the Hodunks are preparing for a final showdown, and Ellie has asked you to be there. Only one family can survive this battle, and it is up to you to decide which one.

GD_Z2_FreeWilly.M_FreeWilly.name: Animal Rights
GD_Z2_FreeWilly.M_FreeWilly.description: Mordecai, furious over Bloodwing's death, asked you to head to the [place]Hyperion Exploitation Preserve[-place] and free three separate creatures from imprisonment so they can tear the staff apart.

GD_Z2_HellHathNo.M_FloodingHyperionCity.name: Hell Hath No Fury
GD_Z2_HellHathNo.M_FloodingHyperionCity.description: Moxxi used to run a deadly tournament known as the Underdome. As revenge for her infidelities, Jack burned it to the ground. She has recently discovered that Jack plans to build his own Underdome in [place]Opportunity[-place], as a further insult to her -- an insult she won't stand for. She has asked you to get to [place]Opportunity[-place] and ensure that the Underdome will never be built.

GD_Z2_HomeMovies.M_HomeMovies.name: Home Movies
GD_Z2_HomeMovies.M_HomeMovies.description: Lilith wants you to hijack Hyperion's dishonest tourism propaganda and replace it with something a little more truthful. And violent.

GD_Z2_HyperionStatue.M_MonumentsVandalis.name: Statuesque
GD_Z2_HyperionStatue.M_MonumentsVandalis.description: Claptrap has asked you to destroy the statues of Handsome Jack in [place]Opportunity[-place], because evidently destroying an image of the bad guy is more important than actually trying to kill the bad guy.

GD_Z2_KillTheSheriff.M_KillTheSheriff.name: Showdown
GD_Z2_KillTheSheriff.M_KillTheSheriff.description: It's time to take down the Sheriff.

GD_Z2_LuckysDirtyMoney.M_FamFeudDeadDrop.name: Clan War: Reach the Dead Drop
GD_Z2_LuckysDirtyMoney.M_FamFeudDeadDrop.description: Tector Hodunk has asked you to retrieve a dead drop, which he's left for you out in [place]The Highlands[-place], that details your next move in the ongoing Hodunk/Zaford clan war.

GD_Z2_LuckysDirtyMoney.M_LuckysDirtyMone.name: Clan War: End of the Rainbow
GD_Z2_LuckysDirtyMoney.M_LuckysDirtyMone.description: The Zaford clan has a secret location where they stash their dirty money. Jimbo Hodunk wants you to track the Zaford's bagman after he leaves the family headquarters, secretly follow him to the stash location, and then loot all the cash inside.
