GD_Z2_MeetWithEllie.M_MeetWithEllie.name: Clan War: Starting the War
GD_Z2_MeetWithEllie.M_MeetWithEllie.description: Two bandit clans have been a thorn in Ellie's side: the Zafords and the Hodunks. She has concocted a plan to start a war between the two families: all you need to do is cause a ruckus at each clan's home base in [place]The Highlands[-place] and [place]The Dust[-place], then leave the emblem of the opposing clan in the wreckage. With any luck, they'll be killing each other off by sundown.

GD_Z2_MothersDayGift.BalanceDefs.M_Mothe.name: Best Mother's Day Ever
GD_Z2_MothersDayGift.BalanceDefs.M_Mothe.description: You've found a Mother's Day present. Unfortunately, it can only be opened with the fist-print of the man who bought it. If you wanna see what's inside the box, you'll have to track down Taggart's fist.

gd_z2_notetoself.M_NoteToSelf.name: Note for Self-Person
gd_z2_notetoself.M_NoteToSelf.description: A Goliath named Crank has a cache of weapons hidden somewhere in [place]The Fridge[-place]. Go find it.

GD_Z2_Overlooked.M_Overlooked.name: The Overlooked: Medicine Man
GD_Z2_Overlooked.M_Overlooked.description: The residents of [place]Overlook[-place] are in desperate need of skull-shivers medicine. You'll have to find three separate shipments of medication to keep the town healthy. The first shipment can be found in a medicine dispensary -- unfortunately, however, the dispensary's power supply is missing and you'll have to find it.

GD_Z2_Overlooked2.M_Overlooked2.name: The Overlooked: Shields Up
GD_Z2_Overlooked2.M_Overlooked2.description: The residents of [place]Overlook[-place] want to rebel against their Hyperion overlords. This will be difficult to do, however, so long as Hyperion holds the ability to level the entire town with a single lunar assault. Karima has asked you to drop as many shields as you can into the Overlook grinder. Once you've ground up enough shields, Karima can use the scraps to build a shield that will protect the city (not unlike [place]Sanctuary's[-place]).

GD_Z2_Overlooked3.M_Overlooked3.name: The Overlooked: This Is Only a Test
GD_Z2_Overlooked3.M_Overlooked3.description: The shield you built for [place]Overlook[-place] hasn't been activated or tested yet. It's time to fix that. Karima has asked you to head to a nearby Hyperion installation and program a mortar to fire at [place]Overlook[-place]. If all goes well, the shield will activate and repel the blast.

GD_Z2_PoeticLicense.M_PoeticLicense.name: Poetic License
GD_Z2_PoeticLicense.M_PoeticLicense.description: Scooter wants to write a love poem, but he needs inspiration. He's asked you to explore Pandora and find natural (or unnatural) landmarks that can inspire him to complete his poem and win the heart of a woman named Daisy.

GD_Z2_Rakkaholics.M_Rakkaholics.name: Rakkaholics Anonymous
GD_Z2_Rakkaholics.M_Rakkaholics.description: Given what happened to Bloodwing, Mordecai wants to get superbly drunk. He has, quite simply, asked you to get him enough booze to knock out a rakk hive. You can steal some rakk-ale from the booze runners in [place]The Dust[-place].

GD_Z2_RiggedRace.M_RiggedRace.name: Clan War: First Place
GD_Z2_RiggedRace.M_RiggedRace.description: With the clan war kicked into high gear, Mick Zaford has asked you to crash the Hodunk's beloved auto race and use explosives to destroy every car on the track.

GD_Z2_RockosModernStrife.M_RockosModernS.name: Rocko's Modern Strife
GD_Z2_RockosModernStrife.M_RockosModernS.description: Brick has set up shop in [place]Sanctuary[-place], but the Slabs still need some stuff done back at [place]Thousand Cuts[-place]. Brick has sent you to meet with his lieutenant, an irascible man named Rocko.

GD_Z2_SafeAndSound.M_SafeAndSound.name: Safe and Sound
GD_Z2_SafeAndSound.M_SafeAndSound.description: During the assault on Sanctuary, Marcus's personal safe was blown out of his store, landing somewhere outside the bounds of the city. He has asked you to go to [place]Sanctuary Hole[-place] so you may return the contents of his safe to him.

GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Adult.name: Animal Rescue: Food
GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Adult.description: After healing the hungry skag's wounds, you discovered he was starving as well. Maybe you could fill his belly with some chow.

GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Den.name: Animal Rescue: Shelter
GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Den.description: Now that the hungry skag has been properly fed, he's too big to fit in his old home. You'll have to escort him to the nearby cave, where he can have the space he needs.

GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Pup.name: Animal Rescue: Medicine
GD_Z2_Skagzilla2.M_Skagzilla2_Pup.description: You found a wounded, hungry, friendly skag. Scooter has suggested you heal and feed him.

GD_Z2_SlapHappy.M_SlapHappy.name: Slap-Happy
GD_Z2_SlapHappy.M_SlapHappy.description: Sir Hammerlock has hired you to kill the thresher who crippled him years ago. You'll have to lure the thresher, Old Slappy, out of hiding with something appetizing. Sir Hammerlock's arm oughtta do.

GD_Z2_SplinterGroup.M_SplinterGroup.name: Splinter Group
GD_Z2_SplinterGroup.M_SplinterGroup.description: Patricia Tannis has hired you to find and kill four dangerous, mutated escapees from [place]Wildlife Exploitation Preserve[-place]. They're hiding in [place]Bloodshot Stronghold[-place], but be careful; they are well-armed, and color-coordinated. First, you'll need to pick up some pizza from Moxxi's bar -- evidently, these creatures love pizza.

GD_Z2_TaggartBiography.M_TaggartBiograph.name: Stalker of Stalkers
GD_Z2_TaggartBiography.M_TaggartBiograph.description: Sir Hammerlock needs information on stalkers, and a former boyfriend of his named Taggart has already begun writing a book about his attempts to exterminate the species entirely. Hammerlock wants you to collect the chapters of Taggart's audiobook so he can plagiarize them.

GD_Z2_TheBankJob.M_TheBankJob.name: Breaking the Bank
GD_Z2_TheBankJob.M_TheBankJob.description: [place]Lynchwood[-place] has a bank. Brick has decided that banks were built for one reason, and one reason only: to be robbed.

GD_Z2_ThresherRaid.M_ThresherRaid.name: You. Will. Die. (Seriously.)
GD_Z2_ThresherRaid.M_ThresherRaid.description: Patricia Tannis has asked you to kill a really, really, really (really) dangerous thresher named Terramorphous the Invincible. Rumors say that it drops some of the best loot found on Pandora. The rumors also say that you'll almost certainly need a group of four people to vanquish it.

GD_Z2_TrailerTrashin.M_TrailerTrashin.name: Clan War: Trailer Trashing
GD_Z2_TrailerTrashin.M_TrailerTrashin.description: Following the death of his son, Peter, Mick Zaford has grown vengeful. He's asked you to head to Hodunk territory and destroy their mobile homes, ideally at night while they are sleeping.

GD_Z2_WakeyWakey.M_WakeyWakey.name: Clan War: Wakey Wakey
GD_Z2_WakeyWakey.M_WakeyWakey.description: The Zaford clan is holding their annual wake for Lucky Zaford, who was killed by Scooter (an ex-Hodunk) several years ago. Jimbo and Tector Hodunk want you to get drunk, crash the wake, and kill everyone inside.

GD_Z2_WrittenByVictor.M_WrittenByVictor.name: Written by the Victor
GD_Z2_WrittenByVictor.M_WrittenByVictor.description: The Hyperion Hall of History gives out cash bonuses to anyone who sits through Handsome Jack's skewed version of Pandoran history.

GD_Z3_Bane.M_Bane.name: The Bane
GD_Z3_Bane.M_Bane.description: You have heard rumors of a powerful, cursed gun known as The Bane. With some help from Marcus Kincaid, you may be able to find this legendary weapon.

GD_Z3_CaptureTheFlags.M_CaptureTheFlags.name: Capture the Flags
GD_Z3_CaptureTheFlags.M_CaptureTheFlags.description: In their long-running war against Mortar's Sawteeth clan, the Slabs have never captured any of Mortar's territory. Brick is hoping you will change that. If you can raise three Slab flags on Mortar's turf in [place]Sawtooth Cauldron[-place], the Slabs' awesomeness as a bandit clan will be solidified.

GD_Z3_ChosenOne.M_ChosenOne.name: The Chosen One
GD_Z3_ChosenOne.M_ChosenOne.description: Kai, a popular ECHOcast host, owes Marcus nine bucks. Marcus has sent you to collect. Kai is missing, however, and your only lead on his whereabouts are the episodes of his ECHOcast he recorded throughout Pandora.

GD_Z3_ColdShoulder.M_ColdShoulder.name: The Cold Shoulder
GD_Z3_ColdShoulder.M_ColdShoulder.description: Scooter's girlfriend, Laney, has been brainwashed into becoming a tunnel rat. Scooter has asked you to bring Laney's favorite flowers and food to her in [place]The Fridge[-place], in the hopes of turning her back into a normal, non-cannibalistic human being.

GD_Z3_CustomerService.M_CustomerService.name: Customer Service
GD_Z3_CustomerService.M_CustomerService.description: Last night, Marcus got drunk and accidentally developed a conscience. In his inebriated state, he mailed out several refund checks to those customers who had been disappointed and/or maimed by his products. Now sober and remorseful, he has asked you to collect the refund checks from the mailboxes before the auto-post sends them off.

GD_Z3_GoodBadMordecai.M_GoodBadMordecai.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Mordecai
GD_Z3_GoodBadMordecai.M_GoodBadMordecai.description: Years ago, Mordecai won the grand prize at Moxxi's Underdome. A little while after that, a thief named Carson stole the loot chest and hid it somewhere in [place]The Dust[-place]. Mordecai has informed you that, if you are able to find Carson and figure out where the guns are buried, you can keep them.

GD_Z3_GrandmotherHouse.M_GrandmotherHous.name: To Grandmother's House We Go
GD_Z3_GrandmotherHouse.M_GrandmotherHous.description: Handsome Jack has asked you to check on his grandmother. He has also assured you that he is not luring you into a trap, presumably while unaware that this is exactly what one would say to a person one is luring into a trap.

GD_Z3_GreatEscape.M_GreatEscape.name: The Great Escape
GD_Z3_GreatEscape.M_GreatEscape.description: A man named Ulysses wants you to help him escape from Pandora. He says if you can bring him a Hyperion lunar supply beacon, he'll be able to leave Pandora.

GD_Z3_HiddenJournals.M_HiddenJournals.name: Hidden Journals
GD_Z3_HiddenJournals.M_HiddenJournals.description: Patricia Tannis, the antisocial archaeologist, has two habits. Firstly, she records every detail of her various psychoses into audio journals. Secondly, she hides those audio journals out of paranoid terror. She has hidden a set of journal entries in [place]The Highlands[-place] and needs you to retrieve them for her.

GD_Z3_HungryLikeSkag.M_HungryLikeSkag.name: Hungry Like the Skag
GD_Z3_HungryLikeSkag.M_HungryLikeSkag.description: A bandit named Carlo was mauled by skags who killed him, then devoured the pieces of his gun. On Pandora, this sort of thing happens more frequently than you might think. You will need to kill some more skags in order to find the missing parts of Carlo's gun.

GD_Z3_HyperionContract873.M_HyperionCont.name: Hyperion Contract #873
GD_Z3_HyperionContract873.M_HyperionCont.description: The Hyperion corporation is offering you a unique gun if you kill the requisite number of bandits for them. Though you would be wise not to trust Hyperion, a reward is a reward, and a dead bandit is a dead bandit.

GD_Z3_KillYourself.M_KillYourself.name: Kill Yourself
GD_Z3_KillYourself.M_KillYourself.description: Handsome Jack has asked you to kill yourself. Jump from Lover's Leap and he will pay you a king's ransom; wuss out and you will get nothing. Your choice.

GD_Z3_LostTreasure.M_LostTreasure.name: The Lost Treasure
GD_Z3_LostTreasure.M_LostTreasure.description: You found part of a treasure map. There is only one thing to do: start killing bandits until you find the other parts of the map, then assemble it and find the treasure. Admittedly, that was three things, but you get the idea.

GD_Z3_MedicalMystery.M_MedicalMystery.name: Medical Mystery
GD_Z3_MedicalMystery.M_MedicalMystery.description: Some civilians from [place]Three Horns Valley[-place] have been showing up at Dr. Zed's clinic with unexplainable wounds -- bullet wounds without bullets, burn marks without charring. He'd like you to head out to [place]Three Horns Valley[-place] and get your hands on whatever's causing these injuries.

GD_Z3_MedicalMystery2.M_MedicalMystery2.name: Medical Mystery: X-Com-municate
GD_Z3_MedicalMystery2.M_MedicalMystery2.description: Dr. Zed has made you his honorary research assistant! Your job: find out more about how this E-tech gun works by ''field-testing'' it on some bandits. Like, by ''shooting'' a bunch of them with it until they ''die.''

GD_Z3_MonsterMash1.M_MonsterMash1.name: Monster Mash (Part 1)
GD_Z3_MonsterMash1.M_MonsterMash1.description: Dr. Zed is paying you to retrieve various creature parts for him. You can get parts from any type of spiderant. He will not say why.

GD_Z3_MonsterMash2.M_MonsterMash2.name: Monster Mash (Part 2)
GD_Z3_MonsterMash2.M_MonsterMash2.description: Dr. Zed is paying you to retrieve even more creature parts for him. He still won't say why.

GD_Z3_MonsterMash3.M_MonsterMash3.name: Monster Mash (Part 3)
GD_Z3_MonsterMash3.M_MonsterMash3.description: Zed's secret projects have gotten loose. He needs you to head to [place]Arid Nexus[-place] and hunt down his abominations.

gd_z3_neitherrainsleet.M_NeitherRainSlee.name: Neither Rain nor Sleet nor Skags
gd_z3_neitherrainsleet.M_NeitherRainSlee.description: The Pandora Postal Service, owned and operated by one Lance Scapelli, is in need of a new courier after the previous one was crippled by the Bloodshot clan. Scapelli has hired you to deliver packages to the various mailboxes scattered around [place]Three Horns[-place] within a certain amount of time.

GD_Z3_OutOfBody.M_OutOfBody.name: Out of Body Experience
GD_Z3_OutOfBody.M_OutOfBody.description: After blasting Loader #1340's AI core out of his body, he has requested that you help him find a new one. This may involve him attempting to kill you a few times, but it's not like that's anything new. For now, Loader #1340 wants you to put him inside an inactive constructor bot.

GD_Z3_PositiveSelfImage.M_PositiveSelfIm.name: Positive Self Image
GD_Z3_PositiveSelfImage.M_PositiveSelfIm.description: The Hodunk bandits in [place]The Dust[-place] have made a hood ornament mocking Ellie's appearance. Unfortunately for them, Ellie has taken a liking to the ornaments and wants a few to use as decoration. She has asked you to destroy any car with the ornament attached to it and bring the ornaments back to her.

GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_1.name: Hyperion Slaughter: Round 1
GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_1.description: You've found Moxxi's final Circle of Slaughter. This circle, run by Innuendobot 5000 (a Hyperion loader reprogrammed by Moxxi to speak almost entirely in double entendres), will throw every manner of Hyperion enemy at you. If you can survive all five rounds, you'll earn a considerable reward.

GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_2.name: Hyperion Slaughter: Round 2
GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_2.description: You've found Moxxi's final Circle of Slaughter. This circle, run by Innuendobot 5000 (a Hyperion loader reprogrammed by Moxxi to speak almost entirely in double entendres), will throw every manner of Hyperion enemy at you. If you can survive all five rounds, you'll earn a considerable reward.

GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_3.name: Hyperion Slaughter: Round 3
GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_3.description: You've found Moxxi's final Circle of Slaughter. This circle, run by Innuendobot 5000 (a Hyperion loader reprogrammed by Moxxi to speak almost entirely in double entendres), will throw every manner of Hyperion enemy at you. If you can survive all five rounds, you'll earn a considerable reward.

GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_4.name: Hyperion Slaughter: Round 4
GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_4.description: You've found Moxxi's final Circle of Slaughter. This circle, run by Innuendobot 5000 (a Hyperion loader reprogrammed by Moxxi to speak almost entirely in double entendres), will throw every manner of Hyperion enemy at you. If you can survive all five rounds, you'll earn a considerable reward.

GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_5.name: Hyperion Slaughter: Round 5
GD_Z3_RobotSlaughter.M_RobotSlaughter_5.description: You've found Moxxi's final Circle of Slaughter. This circle, run by Innuendobot 5000 (a Hyperion loader reprogrammed by Moxxi to speak almost entirely in double entendres), will throw every manner of Hyperion enemy at you. If you can survive all five rounds, you'll earn a considerable reward.

GD_Z3_SwallowedWhole.M_SwallowedWhole.name: Swallowed Whole
GD_Z3_SwallowedWhole.M_SwallowedWhole.description: A bandit known as Shorty defaced one of Scooter's Catch-A-Ride stations. Scooter has asked you to find Shorty in [place]The Fridge[-place] and demand he repay Scooter for the damages. Just kidding. Scooter wants him dead.

GD_Z3_ThisJustIn.M_ThisJustIn.name: This Just In
GD_Z3_ThisJustIn.M_ThisJustIn.description: Since your arrival on Pandora, Hunter Hellquist, of Hyperion Truth Broadcasting, has been spreading lies about your exploits. Mordecai has tracked down the source of those broadcasts and asked you to silence them for good.

gd_z3_toocloseformissiles.M_TooCloseForM.name: Too Close For Missiles
gd_z3_toocloseformissiles.M_TooCloseForM.description: An ex-gyro pilot named Loggins has been kicked out of his flight squad in [place]The Dust[-place]. He's asked you to enact (an admittedly roundabout) revenge on them by destroying the volleyball court they use to blow off steam in between air raids. Don't forget a fire or explosive weapon to finish the job!

GD_Z3_UncleTeddy.M_UncleTeddy.name: Uncle Teddy
GD_Z3_UncleTeddy.M_UncleTeddy.description: A woman named Una has asked you to help her avenge her uncle, Teddy, who lived in [place]Fyrestone[-place]. Teddy, a weapons inventor, was exiled to Pandora after Hyperion stole his weapon designs. If you can find proof of Hyperion's patent theft, Una can sue the pants off them. Metaphorically.

GD_Z3_YouDontKnowJack.M_YouDontKnowJack.name: Get to Know Jack
GD_Z3_YouDontKnowJack.M_YouDontKnowJack.description: Mordecai likes to get to know someone before he kills them. To this end, he's sent you to [place]Arid Nexus[-place] to collect whatever information you can about Handsome Jack's rise to power.
